beer.name: Warrenville Wheat
beer.description: This offering is always brewed with a generous portion of malted wheat, lending a soft bready quality. Styles change with the season and include German-style Hefeweizen, Dunkelweizen, American-style Wheat Ales and Belgian-style White Ales among others. Ask your server to describe our current offering. Silver Medal- 2003 Real Ale Festival (German-Style Ale)
